parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check if [[vehicle]] is locked. If it is locked, [[Object#Person|Persons]] cannot mount / dismount without order.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[locked]] vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>
* [[Number]] - since <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part></template>
** 0: Unlocked
** 1: Default - a subordinate player cannot enter without AI leader order
** 2: Locked
** 3: Locked for player
** -1: vehicle [[isNull|is null]]
* [[Boolean]] for older games

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_locked = [[locked]] _jeepOne;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lock]], [[setVehicleLock]], [[lockedDriver]], [[lockedCargo]], [[lockedTurret]]
</value></part></template>
